DOC.brief_summary: Single-Center, Exploratory Study of EndoChoice's Upper and Lower Gastrointestinal Endoscopic Systems Utilizing EndoChoice's Full Spectrum Optical Technology
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Study of Upper and Lower Endoscopic Fuse System
DOC.detailed_description: The investigational devices are EndoChoice gastrointestinal endoscopic systems that are similar in their fit, form, and functions to the corresponding commercially available models with the exception of the EndoChoice's proprietary Optical system that enhances their field of view.
DOC.criteria: Male and Female patients ages of 1875 The patient has been scheduled for routine screening upper or lower endoscopy, diagnostic endoscopic work up, or endoscopic surveillance. Signed informed consent form Patients who are currently enrolled in another clinical investigation in which the intervention might compromise the safety of the patient's participation in this study. Patients who are unable to consent Pregnant female patients of any age.
